spell1.name: ELEMENT GUNS
spell1.description: Shoot enemies with dual Element Guns

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 10m, decreasing to 60% at 25m

spell2.description: Engage in free-flight and lock onto enemies in sight.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT

spell3.name: ROCKET PROPULSION
spell3.description: Consume energy to gain a Movement Boost and soar forward.

spell4.name: BLASTER BARRAGE
spell4.description: Fire a frenzy of shots, causing damage to enemies within range.

spell5.name: STELLAR SHIFT
spell5.description: Dodge in the direction of movement and swiftly reload.
